title: Executive Order 6181-Purchases of Land for National Forests
content: Section (5) of Executive Order No. 6160, dated June 7, 1933, is hereby amended to the extent that the funds thereby made available for the purchase of forest lands may be expended not only within the forty-two existing National Forest Purchase Units but also within any other National Forest Purchase Unit which may hereafter be established by the Secretary of Agriculture with the concurrence and approval of the National Forest Reservation Commission.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6181-Purchases of Land for National Forests Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362002
